subject: Public Speaking
title: From Debate to Life
description: A 60-second lesson on From Debate to Life.

hook.text: Job interviews are debates. Sales pitches are debates. Life is debate.

buildup.text: Debate teaches clear presentation and adapting to audiences.

discovery.text: In life, you persuade people to trust your vision.

twist.text: Evidence-based thinking and clear communication work everywhere.

climax.text: Debaters succeed in law, business, academia, and politics.

punchline.text: Master debate. Master persuasion. Master life.

quiz.question: Why are debate skills valuable?
options: Clear communication works in jobs, sales, life
